item.title: Static Site Searching with Pagefind!
item.description:
Great news, I tried out integrating Pagefind on this demo site and it works pretty slick. Needed to do a bit of config to correctly set up dark mode UI and some overrides on some existing styling, but otherwise it was pretty seamless.

item.title: Using Mermaid Diagrams
item.description:
Mermaid diagrams1 rendered client-side in your static blog.

    A-->B;
    A-->C;
    B-->D;
    C-->D;

And hereâ€™s another, to prove enumeration is a thing.

sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you?
    loop Healthcheck
        John->>John: Fight against hypochondria
    end
    Note right of John: Rational thoughts!
    John-->>Alice: Great!
    John->>Bob: How about you?
    Bob-->>John: Jolly good!
